Package org.qi4j.library.conversion.values

Interface Summary
EntityToValue  
EntityToValueService The EntityToValueService converts Entities to matching Values.
 

Class Summary
EntityToValue.EntityToValueMixin  
 

Exception Summary
PropertyNotPresentException  
 

Annotation Types Summary
Unqualified If the ValueComposite is annotated with this, it means that the lookup of the Value Property should be performed using the unqualified name only, and not via the default of the full qualified name.
